summary: A young widow moves into an old house on Lake Erie to recover from the sudden loss of her husband; however, she soon discovers a dark secret and that she is not alone.
cast: Lance Henriksen|Marilyn Ghigliotti|Betsy Baker|Al Snow|G. Larry Butler|Meredith Majors|Jason K. Wixom|Anne Leigh Cooper|Chris Majors|Ben Furney|Nevaeh Ashanti|Rocco Guirlanda|Cynthia Merritt|Victoria Johnstone|J. Brian|Camrahn Redding|Tavares Jamal Cherry|Kevin R. Allen|Mickey MacKinlay|Derrick Welton|David Lipe|Evan Back
title: Lake Eerie
